text_block_list.text: After what happen after luxury cruise ship event the other day, helping her training after the test were over has become my daily routine.
Sometime I even show up on my day off like this.
However, the test is coming to an end. This may be the last time I help her training.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Hah… hah… hah…!
Daiichi Ruby is strict with herself. However, from her point of view, she thinks that it is normal to be strict to herself.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Haa…!
And that's why she expect a lot from people around her, while she put even higher expectation on herself.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: "If you have something to aspire to, then behave accordingly. That is what will eventually transforms you into who you aspire to be."
The result of that is the current Daiichi Ruby. A noble run, that is the result of what she wish.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: hah, hah… ha～

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: …Yes, good work.
choice_data_list: The trainer selection test, it's almost over.
The trainer selection test is almost over.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: That's right… You lower your gaze again. Stand up straight and keep your chin down.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Your attitude reflect your state of mind. Why don't you ask yourself once more about the state of your heart?
Just like this, I learn a lot from Daiichi Ruby even if I'm the one who is supposed to give her guidance.
There are other trainers who did not give up and remained in the selection test. The probability of being selected are too low.
In the selection test I learn about my immaturity and my lack of self-confidence. I feel like I manage to face my own weakness.
I tell Daiichi Ruby that I am glad that I took the test. Whatever the outcome, I'm sure this will be important lesson for the future.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ……Yes. Thank you for your hard work.
It's the same word she say after she finish her run. Seeing that distance between us make me feel a little lonely.
I wonder what kind of trainer will be accepted. Whoever it is, I will root for you. I want you to support her as she looks forward nobly, and walk alongside her path.
The letter arrived a week later.
“Thank you very much for participating in the trainer selection test. The selection result is―"
With the letter in hand, I hurriedly left the trainer room.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Hah… haa～…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: … From that look, it look like you received the letter.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: From now on, I'm in your care. Let's be more devoted to each other.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Now then.
I hurriedly stopped Daiichi Ruby, who was about to start running again.
It seems that the "passed'' in the letter wasn't a mistake. But why? My test result is not that good…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: There is no one left but you. Last night, everyone else abstained.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Therefore, you are hired as my trainer. That's all for the explanation.
……That mean, rather than being chosen, it's because I'm the only one remaining? It's just process of elimination… I feel my shoulders dropped.
But no matter the reason, I manage to become her trainer. Let's think positively! And when I lift my face…

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: You did a great job staying until the end. Well done.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: In order to fulfill your duty…… I hope that you too will not neglect your studies.
……After being dazed for a while, I returned to my senses. Did she just praise me? As I savor that feeling of joy―

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Before we sign the contract, There is something you need to do. Please take it from the butler over there and hand it in by tomorrow.
Daiichi Ruby bowed lightly after saying that and started running again. I straighten my back.
That's right. As the trainer of Daiichi Ruby, I cannot let my guard down
I will strive to be someone worthy of her. Even if I'm only chosen by the process of elimination, I will make sure she won't regret it!
